item.description:
Let's talk again this Monday night about the Oyster Fest Sept 11-13.

Conference Call: (605) 990-0015, access code 771-858-638
Meeting ID: 771-858-638

Agenda:


  • 1. Brief review of points discussed last meeting
  • 2. Outreach handouts/magazines
  • 3. Develop talking points (3?)
  • 4. Schedule volunteer meeting
  • a. who is covering which days/hours,
  • b. setup,
  • c. breakdown,
  • d. festival rules
  • 5. How is Jim's chipin going
  • 6. Next meeting Monday 9/7, maybe 8pm due to holiday
  • 7. Other thoughts


barbara g.
item.name: Oyster Festival Teleconference Call
